Alexander.Name: Alexander
Alexander.Prep: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and serve.

Americano.Name: Americano
Americano.Prep: Pour the Campari and vermouth over ice into a highball glass, add a splash of soda water and garnish with half orange slice and a lemon twist.

Angel Face.Name: Angel Face
Angel Face.Prep: Shake all ingredients with ice and strain contents into a cocktail glass.

Aviation.Name: Aviation
Aviation.Prep: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass. Garnish with a cherry.

B-52.Name: B-52
B-52.Prep: Layer ingredients into a shot glass.  Serve with a stirrer.

Bacardi Cocktail.Name: Bacardi Cocktail
Bacardi Cocktail.Prep: Shake together with ice.  Strain into glass and serve

Barracuda.Name: Barracuda
Barracuda.Prep: Shake pour ingredients with ice. Strain into glass, top with Sparkling wine.

Bellini.Name: Bellini
Bellini.Prep: Pour peach purée into chilled glass, add sparkling wine. Stir gently.

Between the Sheets.Name: Between the Sheets
Between the Sheets.Prep: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes, shake, strain into chilled cocktail glass.

Black Russian.Name: Black Russian
Black Russian.Prep: Pour the ingredients into an old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

Bloody Mary.Name: Bloody Mary
Bloody Mary.Prep: Stirring gently, pour all ingredients into highball glass. Garnish.

Bramble.Name: Bramble
Bramble.Prep: Fill glass with crushed ice. Build gin, lemon juice and simple syrup over. Stir, and then pour blackberry liqueur over in a circular fashion to create marbling effect. Garnish with two blackberries and lemon slice.

Caipirinha.Name: Caipirinha
Caipirinha.Prep: Place lime and sugar into old fashioned glass and muddle (mash the two ingredients together using a muddler or a wooden spoon). Fill the glass with ice and add the Cachaça.
Greds: Half a lime cut into 4 wedges

Casino.Name: Casino
Casino.Prep: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into chilled cocktail glass. Garnish with a lemon twist and a maraschino cherry. Serve without a straw.

Champagne Cocktail.Name: Champagne Cocktail
Champagne Cocktail.Prep: Add dash of Angostura bitter onto sugar cube and drop it into champagne flute. Add cognac followed by gently pouring chilled champagne. Garnish with orange slice and maraschino cherry.

Clover Club Cocktail.Name: Clover Club Cocktail
Clover Club Cocktail.Prep: Dry shake ingredients to emulsify, add ice, shake and served straight up.

Cosmopolitan.Name: Cosmopolitan
Cosmopolitan.Prep: Shake all ingredients in cocktail shaker filled with ice. Strain into a large cocktail glass. Garnish with lime slice.

Daiquiri.Name: Daiquiri
Daiquiri.Prep: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well. Double Strain in chilled cocktail glass.

Dark 'n' Stormy.Name: Dark 'n' Stormy
Dark 'n' Stormy.Prep: Fill glass with ice, add rum and top with ginger beer. Garnish with lime wedge.

Derby.Name: Derby
Derby.Prep: Pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. Stir. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a sprig of fresh mint in the drink.

Dry Martini.Name: Dry Martini
Dry Martini.Prep: Straight: Pour all ingredients into mixing glass with ice cubes. Stir well. Strain in chilled martini cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink, or garnish with olive.

Espresso Martini.Name: Espresso Martini
Espresso Martini.Prep: Pour ingredients into shaker filled with ice, shake vigorously, and strain into chilled martini glass.
Greds: Sugar syrup (according to individual preference of sweetness)

French 75.Name: French 75
French 75.Prep: Combine gin, syrup, and lemon juice in a cocktail shaker filled with ice.  Shake vigorously and strain into a chilled champagne glass.  Top up with Champagne. Stir gently.

French Connection.Name: French Connection
French Connection.Prep: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

French Martini.Name: French Martini
French Martini.Prep: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice cubes. Shake well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Squeeze oil from lemon peel onto the drink.

Gin Fizz.Name: Gin Fizz
Gin Fizz.Prep: Shake all ingredients with ice cubes, except soda water. Pour into glass. Top with soda water.

Golden Dream.Name: Golden Dream
Golden Dream.Prep: Shake with cracked ice.  Strain into glass and serve.

Grasshopper.Name: Grasshopper
Grasshopper.Prep: Pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker with ice. Shake briskly and then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Harvey Wallbanger.Name: Harvey Wallbanger
Harvey Wallbanger.Prep: Stir the vodka and orange juice with ice in the glass, then float the Galliano on top.  Garnish and serve.

Hemingway Special.Name: Hemingway Special
Hemingway Special.Prep: Pour all ingredients into a shaker with ice. Shake.

Horse's Neck.Name: Horse's Neck
Horse's Neck.Prep: Pour brandy and ginger ale directly into highball glass with ice cubes. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon zest. If desired, add dashes of Angostura Bitter.

Irish Coffee.Name: Irish Coffee
Irish Coffee.Prep: Heat the coffee, whiskey and sugar; do not boil. Pour into glass and top with cream; serve hot.

John Collins.Name: John Collins
John Collins.Prep: Pour all ingredients directly into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish. Add a dash of Angostura bitters.
Greds: 3 cl (2 parts) freshly squeezed lemon juice

Kamikaze.Name: Kamikaze
Kamikaze.Prep: Shake all ingredients together with ice. Strain into glass, garnish and serve.

Kir.Name: Kir
Kir.Prep: Add the crème de cassis to the bottom of the glass, then top up with wine.

Lemon Drop Martini.Name: Lemon Drop Martini
Lemon Drop Martini.Prep: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass rimmed with sugar.

Long Island Iced Tea.Name: Long Island Iced Tea
Long Island Iced Tea.Prep: Add all ingredients into highball glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with lemon spiral. Serve with straw.[1]

Mai Tai.Name: Mai Tai
Mai Tai.Prep: Shake all ingredients with ice. Strain into glass. Garnish and serve with straw.

Manhattan.Name: Manhattan
Manhattan.Prep: Stirred over ice, strained into a chilled glass, garnished, and served up.

Margarita.Name: Margarita
Margarita.Prep: Pour all ingredients into shaker with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass rimmed with salt.

Mary Pickford.Name: Mary Pickford
Mary Pickford.Prep: Shake and strain into a chilled large cocktail glass

Mimosa.Name: Mimosa
Mimosa.Prep: Ensure both ingredients are well chilled, then mix into the glass. Serve cold.

Mint Julep.Name: Mint Julep
Mint Julep.Prep: In a highball glass gently muddle the mint, sugar and water. Fill the glass with cracked ice, add Bourbon and stir well until the glass is well frosted. Garnish with a mint sprig.

Mojito.Name: Mojito
Mojito.Prep: Muddle mint leaves with sugar and lime juice. Add a splash of soda water and fill the glass with cracked ice. Pour the rum and top with soda water. Garnish with sprig of mint leaves and lemon slice. Serve with straw.
Greds: 2 teaspoons sugar (or 2 cl of sugar syrup)

Monkey Gland.Name: Monkey Gland
Monkey Gland.Prep: Shake well over ice cubes in a shaker, strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Negroni.Name: Negroni
Negroni.Prep: Stir into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

Old Fashioned.Name: Old Fashioned
Old Fashioned.Prep: Place sugar cube in old fashioned glass and saturate with bitters, add a dash of plain water. Muddle until dissolved. Fill the glass with ice cubes and add whiskey. Garnish with orange twist, and a cocktail cherry.

Paradise.Name: Paradise
Paradise.Prep: Shake together over ice.  Strain into cocktail glass and serve chilled.

Pisco Sour.Name: Pisco Sour
Pisco Sour.Prep: Vigorously shake contents in a cocktail shaker with ice cubes, then strain into a glass and garnish with bitters.[1]

Piña Colada.Name: Piña Colada
Piña Colada.Prep: Blend all the ingredients with ice in a electric blender, pour into a large goblet or Hurricane glass and serve with straws.

Planter's Punch.Name: Planter's Punch
Planter's Punch.Prep: Pour all ingredients, except the bitters, into shaker filled with ice. Shake well. Pour into large glass, filled with ice. Add dash Angostura bitters. Garnish with cocktail cherry and pineapple.

Porto Flip.Name: Porto Flip
Porto Flip.Prep: Shake ingredients together in a mixer with ice.  Strain into glass, garnish and serve

Ramos Gin Fizz.Name: Ramos Gin Fizz
Ramos Gin Fizz.Prep: All ingredients except the soda are poured in a mixing glass, dry shaken (no ice) for two minutes, then ice is added and shaken hard for another minute. Strain into a highball glass without ice and topped with soda.

Rose.Name: Rose
Rose.Prep: Shake together in a cocktail shaker, then strain into chilled glass.  Garnish and serve.

Rum and Coke (Cuba Libre).Name: Rum and Coke (Cuba Libre)
Rum and Coke (Cuba Libre).Prep: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

Russian Spring Punch.Name: Russian Spring Punch
Russian Spring Punch.Prep: Pour the ingredients into an highball glass, top with Sparkling wine.

Rusty Nail.Name: Rusty Nail
Rusty Nail.Prep: Pour all ingredients directly into old-fashioned glass filled with ice. Stir gently. Garnish with a lemon twist. Serve.

Cognac Sazerac.Name: Cognac Sazerac
Cognac Sazerac.Prep: Rinse a chilled old-fashioned glass with the absinthe, add crushed ice, and set it aside. Stir the remaining ingredients over ice and set it aside. Discard the ice and any excess absinthe from the prepared glass, and strain the drink into the glass. Add the lemon peel for garnish.[1]

Screwdriver.Name: Screwdriver
Screwdriver.Prep: Mix in a highball glass with ice. Garnish and serve.

Sea Breeze.Name: Sea Breeze
Sea Breeze.Prep: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with lime wedge.

Sex on the Beach.Name: Sex on the Beach
Sex on the Beach.Prep: Build all ingredients in a highball glass filled with ice. Garnish with orange slice.

Sidecar.Name: Sidecar
Sidecar.Prep: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into cocktail glass.

Singapore Sling.Name: Singapore Sling
Singapore Sling.Prep: Pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. Shake well. Strain into highball glass. Garnish with pineapple and cocktail cherry.

Spritz Veneziano.Name: Spritz Veneziano
Spritz Veneziano.Prep: Build into glass over ice, garnish and serve.

Stinger.Name: Stinger
Stinger.Prep: Pour in a mixing glass with ice, stir and strain into a cocktail glass.  May also be served on rocks in a rocks glass.

Tequila Sunrise.Name: Tequila Sunrise
Tequila Sunrise.Prep: Pour the tequila and orange juice into glass over ice.  Add the grenadine, which will sink to the bottom.  Stir gently to create the sunrise effect.  Garnish and serve.

The Godfather.Name: The Godfather
The Godfather.Prep: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

The Godmother.Name: The Godmother
The Godmother.Prep: Pour all ingredients directly into old fashioned glass filled with ice cubes. Stir gently.

Tommy's Margarita.Name: Tommy's Margarita
Tommy's Margarita.Prep: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Tuxedo.Name: Tuxedo
Tuxedo.Prep: Stir all ingredients with ice and strain into a cocktail glass.  Garnish with a cherry and a twist of lemon zest.

Vampiro.Name: Vampiro
Vampiro.Prep: Pour ingredients into glass rimmed with salt. Stir.
Greds: Few slices fresh red hot chili pepper

Vesper.Name: Vesper
Vesper.Prep: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass. Add the garnish.

Whiskey Sour.Name: Whiskey Sour
Whiskey Sour.Prep: Shake with ice. Strain into chilled glass, garnish and serve.

White Lady.Name: White Lady
White Lady.Prep: Add all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well and strain into large cocktail glass.

Yellow Bird.Name: Yellow Bird
Yellow Bird.Prep: Shake and strain into a chilled cocktail glass
